body:
Following https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/22907#issuecomment-824218296
in order to cleanly add plugins using spack, a good way is to extend "visit" so that plugins can be activated in the visit prefix.
Also, in order to build plugins against a VisIt installed through spack, I added VISIT_INSTALL_THIRD_PARTY=ON
to cmake args - thanks to Kathleen Biagas.
title: visit: make it extendable for plugins
